```{r setup, include = FALSE, , message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
 
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(kableExtra)

```

```{r}
# Read in hare bonanza data

hares <- read_csv(here("data", "bonanza_hares.csv"))

hares
```


```{r}

# Convert date to to format

hares_date <- hares %>%        
  mutate(date = mdy(date)) %>%   # convert date char. to date format
  mutate(year = year(date))  # add new column for year

# Count annual hare traps.
  
hares_an_count <- hares_date %>% # Use date datasets
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(sample_size = n())

hares_an_count

ggplot(data = hares_an_count, aes(x = year, y = sample_size)) +
  geom_col() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Annual Juvenile Hare Trappings", 
       caption = "Figure 1: Annual Juvenile Hare Trappings by Year")


  
```
```{r}

ggplot(data = hares_date, aes(x=year)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_minimal()
```
